Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller.UserController
@Controller public class UserController extends Object
Class for handling user related changes other than adding users. Houses the admin_user webpage.
Author:
Dalton Stenzel

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController(UserRepository userRepository, EvaluatorRepository evaluatorRepository, EvaluationRepository evaluationRepository, AddUserController addUserController)

  • Method Details

    • home

      @RequestMapping(path={"/admin_users/","/search"}) public String home(User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String keyword, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr)
      Method called upon loading the admin user page in order to add/edit/delete/view users. Calls several methods from the AdminMethodsService for performing sorting and the amount of pages needed to be viewable.
      Parameters:
      user - is a User object required for the webpage, or else an "IllegalStateException error occurs.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      keyword - is a String used to hold a particular search term entered by the user.
      perPage - is a Integer used to store the value of how many users should be displayed on a page at once.
      sort - is a String used to hold the type of sort to be used on the users to be displayed.
      currPage - is an Integer used to store the current page the user is on for viewing users.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the list of users will be displayed as: ascending(1) or descending(0).
      Returns:
      the admin_user html page.

    • editSettings

      @RequestMapping("/user_settings/") public String editSettings(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method called when a user decides to edit their own account with the "My Account" button on most pages.
      Parameters:
      authentication - is an Authentication object used in this instance to get the current user logged in.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      Returns:
      user_settings html webpage.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/edit/{id}/") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("keyword") String keyword, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr, User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method for editing other users from an edit button on the admin users page.
      Parameters:
      id - is a long that contains the id value of the user selected to be edited.
      user - is a User object that gets used to find the specific user being edited.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      keyword - is a String used to hold a particular search term entered by the user.
      perPage - is a Integer used to store the value of how many users should be displayed on a page at once.
      sort - is a String used to hold the type of sort to be used on the users to be displayed.
      currPage - is an Integer used to store the current page the user is on for viewing users.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the list of users will be displayed as: ascending or descending.
      Returns:
      admin_user_update html webpage.

    • updateUser

      @PostMapping("/update/{id}/") public String updateUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("keyword") String keyword, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr, @Validated User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      id - is a long used to hold the value of the user that is in the process of having their information updated.
      perPage - is a Integer used to store the value of how many users should be displayed on a page at once.
      sort - is a String used to hold the type of sort to be used on the users to be displayed.
      keyword - is a String used to hold a particular search term entered by the user.
      currPage - is an Integer used to store the current page the user is on for viewing users.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the list of users will be displayed as: ascending or descending.
      user - is a User object.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      Returns:
      admin_user_update html webpage.

    • deleteUser

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}/") public Object deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam("keyword") String keyword, @RequestParam("perPage") Integer perPage, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam("currPage") Integer currPage, @RequestParam("sortOr") Integer sortOr, User deletedUser, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redir)
      Method for deleting users when a "Delete User" button is pressed on the admin user page. Administrative users are prevented from deleting other users with the same role.
      Parameters:
      id - is a long used to store the id of the user being deleted.
      keyword - is a String used to hold the set of characters provided to be searched for.
      perPage - is a Integer used to store the value of how many users should be displayed on a page at once.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      sort - is a String used to hold the type of sort to be used on the users to be displayed.
      currPage - is an Integer used to store the current page the user is on for viewing users.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine the order in which the list of users will be displayed as: ascending or descending.
      redir - is a RedirectAttributes object used to send attributes to a webpage, similar to the model included.
      deletedUser - is a User object that is needed for some reason, error "java.lang.IllegalStateException: Neither BindingResult nor plain target object for bean name 'user' available as request attribute" returns without a user.
      Returns:
      admin_users html webpage.

    • changeUser

      @PostMapping("/change/{id}") public String changeUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method for attempting to apply changes that a user has applied for on their "My Account" page. The method calls the comparingMethod from an instance of AdminMethodsService to do some checking and add messages to the webpage.
      Parameters:
      id - is a long used to hold the id of the user having the changes applied to.
      user - is a User object used to hold the changes attempting to be applied in the database.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to a webpage.
      Returns:
      user_settings html webpage.
